name: mirada
description: Node.js and Browser high level OpenCv API. Based on OpenCv.js and  distributed as npm package with support for TypeScript and  easy APIs for server and browser.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist docs tmp* test-browser-outdir api
scripts.test: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config.js
scripts.test-js: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config-js.js
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.docs: npm run docs-readme-toc && npm run docs-api-md && npm run docs-api-html
scripts.docs-api-md: rm -rf ./api && mkdir -p ./api && typedoc --ignoreCompilerErrors --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --out ./api --mode modules --readme none src/index.ts src/types/opencv/index.ts && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/mirada-opencv-api-md && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/mirada-opencv-api-md && mv api/* ../../demos/docs/mirada-opencv-api-md
scripts.docs-api-html: rm -rf ./api && mkdir -p ./api && typedoc --ignoreCompilerErrors --plugin none --theme default --out ./api --readme none --mode modules src/index.ts  && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/mirada-opencv-api-html && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/mirada-opencv-api-html && mv api/* ../../demos/docs/mirada-opencv-api-html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && npm run copy && npm run bundle-umd
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js && npm run test-browser && npm run docs
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m 'version patch' && npm version patch && npm publish
